quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! First off, recover the apple from the Red Basket within the JC Mart. Then, take the banana from the Yellow Basket within the JC Mart. With the banana, make absolutely sure that the Freezer is open. After you have opened the Freezer, recover the ice cream lolly from the Freezer within the JC Mart. And then, place the apple on the plate. And then, rest the knife on the plate. After that, eat the banana. And then, eat the ice cream lolly. That's it!
commands: take ice cream lolly from Freezer
take ice cream lolly from Freezer

infos.name: JC Mart
infos.desc: Hi! Welcome to the JC Mart where customers are always looked after, whilst enjoying a shopping adventure

infos.name: Red Basket
infos.desc: The Red Basket looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: Yellow Basket
infos.desc: The Yellow Basket looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: Freezer
infos.desc: The Freezer looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: apple
infos.desc: Wow! You have found a beautiful red apple that looks quite tasty.

infos.name: banana
infos.desc: Bravo! You have found a long yellow banana that has just ripened.

infos.name: ice cream lolly
infos.desc: that's an ordinary ice cream lolly!

walkthrough: take ice cream lolly from Freezer

objective: Get ready to pick stuff up and put it in places, because you've just entered TextWorld! First off, ensure that the Freezer is open. If you have pulled open the Freezer, retrieve the ice cream lolly from the Freezer. And then, eat the ice cream lolly. And once you've done that, you win!
